Body:
X1_prime = [1.0, 2.0]
X2_prime = [1.0, 1.0]
X3_prime = [-1.0, -0.5]
orient_tensor = numpy.array([[5.0, 3.0, -2.0], [3.0, 2.0, -1.5], [-2.0, -
    1.5, 1.25]])
orient_tensor = orient_tensor
result = lib_direct.get_orientation_tensor(X1_prime, X2_prime, X3_prime)
v = numpy.allclose(result['orient_tensor'], orient_tensor)
self.assertTrue(v)
